original_text:
And again Isaiah says,
“The root of Jesse will come,
    even he who arises to rule the Gentiles;
in him will the Gentiles hope.”
korean_text: 또 이사야가 이르되 이새의 뿌리 곧 열방을 다스리기 위하여 일어나시는 이가 있으리니 열방이 그에게 소망을 두리라 하였느니라

sentences.original_text: The root of Jesse will come,
even he who arises to rule the Gentiles;
in him will the Gentiles hope.”
